p: We thank the South African National Research Foundation (NRF), the Oppenheimer Memorial Trust, the Carnegie Corporation of New York, the global change SysTem for Analysis, Research and Training (START), the University of the Witwatersrand, and the Australian Research Council for financial support. We thank Dr Leith Meyer and the Central Animal Services of the University of the Witwatersrand for providing veterinary expertise in our field studies, and the managers and owners of numerous field sites for allowing us access to their facilities, and providing invaluable support.
